short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For a better psychological experience, you can hide the number of tweets views

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extensions helps people who want to hide tweets view count from their timeline for better twitter experience.

You can send your feed back on twitter: https://twitter.com/zer0xtj
